Quad bike death: Patoka farming accident victim named as Malcolm MacDonald https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/quad-bike-death-patoka-farming-accident-victim-named-as-malcolm-macdonald/UWFV2VZ4AZBTPEAFY65HVJBYSU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/quad-bike-death-patoka-farming-accident-victim-named-as-malcolm-macdonald/UWFV2VZ4AZBTPEAFY65HVJBYSU/ Macdonald, a familiar face at the Hastings saleyards, died in Patoka on Tuesday afternoon. Sun, 09 Feb 2025 00:40:14 +0000 Emergency services were called to Waihau Rd in Patoka where Malcolm MacDonald died in a workplace accident.

Boy racer facing multiple charges after performing burnouts in Lower Hutt https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/boy-racer-facing-multiple-charges-after-performing-performing-burnouts-nouts-in-lower-hutt/h4oxqpx7c5hmrkyilao67n2vau/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/boy-racer-facing-multiple-charges-after-performing-performing-burnouts-nouts-in-lower-hutt/h4oxqpx7c5hmrkyilao67n2vau/ The 24-year-old man was taken into police custody and had his car impounded. Rotorua woman Stevee Ormsby denies assaulting Tauranga man in clash over ‘dangerous’ parking https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/rotorua-woman-stevee-stevee-mormsby-denies-denies-ansaulting-tauranga-man-who-confronted--her-her-about-her-about-danger-danger-danger-danger-danger-danger-parking/ckqrp6gemnc4vlmamgtlp3lpp3lpp3lp3 u5q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/rotorua-woman-stevee-stevee-mormsby-denies-denies-ansaulting-tauranga-man-who-confronted--her-her-about-her-about-danger-danger-danger-danger-danger-danger-parking/ckqrp6gemnc4vlmamgtlp3lpp3lpp3lp3 u5q/ Hannah BartlettStevee Ormsby denies assaulting a man who confronted her about her parking. Sat, 08 Feb 2025 23:00:00 +0000 When Rotorua woman Stevee Ormsby arrived to rugby practice to find all the angle parks taken, she followed the lead of other cars, and parked on broken yellow lines. A concerned resident confronted her, and she's alleged to have assaulted him. Generic image.
Auckland Art Gallery closes due to ‘unexpected building issues’, safety concerns https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-art-art-gallery-closes-due-due-to-to-to-building-building-issues-safety-concerns/6qqoygrsvbbb6titl4anbnotxai/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-art-art-gallery-closes-due-due-to-to-to-building-building-issues-safety-concerns/6qqoygrsvbbb6titl4anbnotxai/ A leaking pipe on the second floor of the gallery has forced its closure. Sat, 08 Feb 2025 22:32:43 +0000 The gallery is being closed because of safety concerns, and an assessment is under way.
Person rushed to hospital from Northland’s Shipwrecked Music Festival https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/person-rushed-to-hospital-from-northlands-shiped-music-festival/3ckqgcgcuirzek3pufetuuiqngvi/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/person-rushed-to-hospital-from-northlands-shiped-music-festival/3ckqgcgcuirzek3pufetuuiqngvi/ A nearby resident was woken by the helicopter before 5am.
